Reviews.Title: Night picture Noisy with Bright Spotlight Center
Reviews.Author: Dwight H. Davis
Reviews.Content: Arrived in good time, easy to install. IR Picture noisy compared to Lorex cameras I already have. IR Very Bright spotlight in center. Plan to return

Reviews.Title: Good lense and fast customer service response!
Reviews.Author: Elijah Li
Reviews.Content: Ordered four of these lenses for my client and realized that one of the lense has a missing power supply so I contacted the seller and within 3 days got my part.  The lense is very clear and no adjustment needed and come with the power and video cable!  Highly recommended!
